review: We recently purchased the Fire TV Stick for one of our 'dumb' TV's to gain access to internet content such as Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu Plus.  The price of this unit is very competitive and reasonable.  As for usability the unit was easy to setup, has a nice user interface and navigational control, remote does most functions with ease. Also very nice is the ability to use Amazon Photo and Music (Prime Subscription required).  I did not spend any time with games so can't comment much there.While text entry can be accomplished with the remote it can be a tedious tasks for some.  However, if you have an Android device (phone or tablet) there is an app that provides voice search, keyboard entry and navigation control.I highly recommend the Fire TV Stick to anyone looking to enhance their TV viewing experience.  I would also give 5-stars if the unit worked with an external keyboard (Bluetooth or IR) and provided search results from all sources and not just focused on Amazon Prime content.
